channel.title: CVE Feed for CryoutCreations -- Esotera

item.title: CVE-2024-43952|2024-08-29T17:54:36.243Z -- cryoutcreations -- esotera
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in CryoutCreations Esotera allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Esotera: from n/a through 1.2.5.1.
